text: The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Football isn't a contact sport; it's a collision sport. Dancing is a contact sport.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: To play this game (football) you must have fire in you, and there is nothing that strokes fire like hate.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: The dictionary is the only place that success comes before work. Work is the key to success, and hard work can help you accomplish anything.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Individual commitment to a group effort--that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.

text: If winning isn't everything, why do they keep score?

text: It's not whether you get knocked down; it's whether you get up.

text: Winning means you're willing to go longer, work harder, and give more than anyone else.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Winners never quit, and quitters never win.

text: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever - the one who recognizes the challenges and does something about it.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: It's not whether you get knocked down. It's whether you get up again.

text: The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence, regardless of their chosen field of endeavor.

text: Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.

text: Winning isn't everything. It's the only thing.

text: Winning is not a sometime thing; It's an all the time thing. You don't win once in a while; you don't do things right once in a while; you do them right all the time.

text: All right Mister, let me tell you what winning means - you're willing to go longer, work harder, give more than anyone else.

text: Winning is a habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.

text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.

text: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.

text: We would accomplish many more things if we did not think of them as impossible.

text: People who work together will win, whether it be against complex football defenses, or the problems of modern society.

text: If you'll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.

text: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.

text: Build for your team a feeling of oneness, of dependence on one another and of strength to be derived by unity.

text: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.

text: Leaders aren't born they are made. And they are made just like anything else, through hard work. And that's the price we'll have to pay to achieve that goal, or any goal.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Practice does not make perfect. Only perfect practice makes perfect.

text: I firmly believe that any man's finest hour, the greatest fulfillment of all that he holds dear, is that moment when he has worked his heart out in a good cause and lies exhausted on the field of battle - victorious.

text: Success comes before work only in the dictionary.

text: The strength of the group is the strength of the leaders.

text: The spirit, the will to win and the will to excel are the things that endure. These qualities are so much more important than the events that occur.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Perfection is not attainable. But if we chase perfection, we can catch excellence.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: A man can be as great as he wants to be. If you believe in yourself and have the courage, the determination, the dedication, the competitive drive and if you are willing to sacrifice the little things in life and pay the price for the things that are worthwhile, it can be done.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: The greatest accomplishment is not in never failing, but in rising again after you fall.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Leaders are made, they are not born. They are made by hard effort, which is the price which all of us must pay to achieve any goal that is worthwhile.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Football is like life it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.

text: Individual commitment to a group effort that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.

text: Winners never quit and quitters never win.

text: Mental toughness is essential to success.

text: Mental toughness is spartanism with qualities of sacrifice, self-denial, dedication. It is fearlessness, and it is love.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Winning isn't everything, it's the only thing.

text: It's easy to have faith in yourself and have discipline when you're a winner, when you're number one. What you got to have is faith and discipline when you're not a winner.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: It's easy to have faith in yourself and have discipline when you're a winner, when you're no. 1. What you've got to have is faith and discipline when you're not yet a winner.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Faithfulness and truth are the most sacred excellences and endowments of the human mind.

text: If you believe in yourself and have the courage, the determination, the dedication, the competitive drive and if you are willing to sacrifice the little things in life and pay the price for the things that are worthwhile, it can be done.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: The real glory is being knocked to your knees and then coming back. That's real glory. That's the essence of it.

text: Coaches who can outline plays on a black board are a dime a dozen. The ones who win get inside their player and motivate.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Mental toughness is a state of mind - you could call it 'character in action.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Mental toughness is many things and rather difficult to explain. Its qualities are sacrifice and self-denial. Also, most importantly, it is combined with a perfectly disciplined will that refuses to give in. It's a state of mind-you could call it character in action.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Success is not a sometimes thing. In other words, you don't do what is right once in awhile, but all the time. Success is a habit. Winning is a habit.

text: The difference between men is in energy, in the strong will, in the settled purpose and in the invincible determination.

text: And I'd like to say that the quality of any man's life has got to be a full measure of that man's personal commitment to excellence and to victory, regardless of what field he may be in.

text: Football is like life - it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Character is just another word for having a perfectly disciplined and educated will. A person can make his own character by blending these elements with an intense desire to achieve excellence. Everyone is different in what I will call magnitude, but the capacity to achieve character is still the same.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Motivate by inches. Better to begin with small victories than large frustrations.

text: I firmly believe that any man's finest hour is that moment when he has worked his heart out in good cause and lies exhausted on the field of battle victorious.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Life's battles don't always go to the stronger or the faster man. But sooner or later the man who wins, is the man who thinks he can.
author: Vince Lombardi
